response.overview: The story is about Diya life.She falls love with Sandeep.But one day some un known people will do black magic on her.Diya's behaviour will chnages then Sandeep will leave her.But Diya will not forget Sandeep.Atlast Daniel will rescue this operation to save Diya from that black magic.Then she will become normal.
response.title: Mouna Vizhigal
